page.title: 08THE HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: When Dr.Humphreys first came to Crickhowell in 1948 there were only two doctors and the surgery was at Bryn-Rhos. They moved to Llanbedr Road and then employed a secretary.They are now at the{War Memorial Health Centre where they employ many people. There are now four doctors plus two training doctors. A Dentist, Chiropodist, and an Optician all use the Health Centre at certain times. The medical profession now prefers to treat their patients at the surgery and make fewer home visits than was once the case. The main attempt in medicine is {prevention}which they do by encouraging good health practice,i.e. exercise, no smoking and good eating habits.
